name: COVETOUS - ESPEJO FÉMINA
description:
And then came the cross.
The roundness and the orbs had already become so perfect,that only a fleshy god
could destroy eternity.
In this extract from the poem, pictured by @D_Mogeon, we pictured the History of mankind backwards.
In a way, we wanted to go to the beginning of the journey. We viewed our time on the planet from way above, from beyond time, to try and solve the puzzle. To recognise the place where we, women, began to be left behind.
Presentamos al tiempo como una invención del ser humano, junto a la justificación de dioses que demandaron nuestro sacrificio, nuestro silencio.
Covetous: the envy that lead to our invisibility.
